summary: Gives you 200 of every ingot and sets your carryweight to 1.000.000
descriptionHtml:
Gives you 200 of every ingot and sets your carryweight to 1.000.000

To mod your carryweight: player.forceav carryweight x (x is your number)

Skyrim folder is usually in: C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Bethesda Softworks\\The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim

Start up skyrim, open the console (~ or ยง) and type: bat GetIngots
author: Theshawty
